frame.name: FR_Cause_earning
frame.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Cause_of_earning</fen> is an action or entity that generates <fen>Money</fen> for an <fen>Earner</fen>. The <fen>Cause_of_earning</fen> is not directly some goods exchanged in a transaction, but rather e.g. a tax, or a financial product or an action (a selling for instance). <ex></ex> <ex>FR-EX: <fex name="Cause_of_earning">La cession de ces entreprises</fex> devrait <t>rapporter</t> au <fex name="Earner">Trésor public marocain</fex> <fex name="Money">entre 30 et 35 milliards de dirhams</fex>.</ex> <ex>FR-EX: On estime que <fex name="Cause_of_earning">la hausse de 1 %</fex> a <t>rapporté</t> <fex name="Money">14 milliards</fex> la première année.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Earner
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Earner</fen> is involved in a transaction or set of transactions as the party that receives payment.</def-root>

FE.name: Money
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Money</fen> are the money given to the <fen>Earner</fen> in a transaction, generally in exchange for <fen>Goods</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Cause_of_earning
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Cause_of_earning</fen> is the source of the <fen>Money</fen> earned by <fen>Earner</fen> (which can be an entity like a financial product, or an event such as selling goods or increasing taxes).</def-root>
